remarks: Negation of a single coordinate in a structure product.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
prdsinvgd2.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsinvgd2.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsinvgd2.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsinvgd2.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Grp ) $.
prdsinvgd2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsinvgd2.n $e |- N = ( invg ` Y ) $.
prdsinvgd2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
prdsinvgd2.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. I ) $.
prdsinvgd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` X ) ` J ) = ( ( invg ` ( R ` J ) ) ` ( X ` J ) ) ) $.
